sentences.en: A consortium of construction companies will build the power - station.
sentences.cn: 由建筑公司组成的集团将建造该发电站.

sentences.en: As with the magazine consortium , media companies own equity stakes in Hulu.
sentences.cn: Hulu受到了消费者和公司的欢迎.

sentences.en: Bank Consortium Business Hubei Branch Celebrates Olympics, double upgrade Tournament.
sentences.cn: 银联商务湖北分公司举办迎奥运, 双升级联谊赛.

sentences.en: But the consortium that won the contract for the island opted for a more aggressive approach.
sentences.cn: 但是赢得合同的财团选择了一种更加有闯劲的方法.

sentences.en: Election expenses consortium funded by the monopoly.
sentences.cn: 竞选经费由垄断财团资助.

sentences.en: Enter into any joint venture , partnership or consortium arrangement.
sentences.cn: 签订任何合营或联营协议.

sentences.en: Experts, including those in the consortium are split into two warring camps.
sentences.cn: 鸟类学专家们 —— 鸟类大脑命名法协会里的科学家——甚至分成了两个对立的阵营.

sentences.en: Tender will be accepted from any partnership , private company, or consortium.
sentences.cn: 欢迎任何一家合伙公司, 私人企业或财团前来投标.

sentences.en: That answer comes from biological oceanographer Nancy Rabalais of the Louisiana Universities Marine Consortium.
sentences.cn: 您正在收听的是路易斯安那大学海事协会海洋生物学家南希·拉尔莱的讲话.

sentences.en: The aircraft will be built by a European consortium.
sentences.cn: 这种飞机将由欧洲的一个财团建造。

sentences.en: the Anglo-French consortium that built the Channel Tunnel
sentences.cn: 修建英吉利海峡隧道的英法财团

sentences.en: The Bluebook is updated every few years by a consortium of law schools.
sentences.cn: 范本每隔几年会由法学院协会更新.

sentences.en: The consortium includes some of the biggest building contractors in Britain.
sentences.cn: 该联合企业包括英国最大的一些建筑承包商。

sentences.en: The Consortium only permitted adding comments to the existing standard.
sentences.cn: 联合会只批准了对现有标准的批注.

sentences.en: The new aircraft was developed by a European consortium.
sentences.cn: 这种新飞机是一家欧洲财团出资研制的.

sentences.en: They have recently formed a consortium of textile manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 最近他们组成了一家纺织联营企业.

trans.tran_cn: 财团，组合，共同体，[法]配偶的地位和权利，<美>大学联盟协定
trans.tran_en: a group of companies or organizations who are working together to do something
